## Faceting

Let's break down `penguins` bill length and depth by species.

```{r}
#| warning: false
ggplot(penguins, aes(x = bill_length_mm,
                     y = bill_depth_mm,
                     color = species)) + 
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Bill length (mm)",
       y = "Bill depth (mm)",
       color = "Species",
       title = "Penguin bills") +
  facet_wrap(~species,
             ncol = 1) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
  theme_minimal()
```

Let's do one more plot using `sex`. For illustration only; this isn't a great plot.

```{r}
#| warning: false
ggplot(penguins, aes(x = bill_length_mm,
                     y = bill_depth_mm,
                     color = sex)) +
  geom_point() + 
  facet_wrap(~species) + 
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
  theme_minimal()

```
